csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <citation>
        <option name="disambiguate-add-givenname" value="true"/>
        <option name="givenname-disambiguation-rule" value="primary-name"/>
        <layout delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="author" delimiter=", ">
                <name and="text" delimiter-precedes-last="never" form="short"/>
            </names>
            <group prefix=" (" suffix=")">
                <date variable="issued">
                    <date-part name="year"/>
                </date>
            </group>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
result: Aloysius Asthma and Bronchitis (1980); Artemis Asthma and Bronchitis (1995)
